name: xnegred

stmt.origin: syl(w0, wb(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(cxne(c0), cr)), wcel(c0, cxr))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(cxne(c0), cr)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cxr))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cxr), wb(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(cxne(c0), cr)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(cxne(c0), cr)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cxr))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cxr), wb(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(cxne(c0), cr)))

body.origin: |- wi(wcel(c0, cxr), wb(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(cxne(c0), cr)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(cxne(c0), cr)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cxr))

comment: An extended real is real if and only if its extended negative is real. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 2-Jan-2022.)
